Name: CAMPING
About the game: It's finally Summer! And so you and your friends decided to go camping in the woods! When suddenly one of your friends disappears! Embark on a short adventure story game with retro graphics, go through the forest and discover the truth behind it all. Through the Forest Explore through the forest during the day, then dive deep in the darkness of the forest at night. Watch your back Run and hide, as you progress through the florest, beware what will be lurking... You never know when there'll be an animal ready to attack you... Be sure to gather pebbles, they'll be useful.
